languages.text: "Раньше мы действовали как единое целое. Но это больше не так, и остатки моего самообладания полетели в пропасть. Вот он я, полюбуйся — ошметок человека, а не арбитр. Придаток к кибермастифу".
"We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."
languages.original_text: "Раньше мы действовали как единое целое. Но это больше не так, и остатки моего самообладания полетели в пропасть. Вот он я, полюбуйся — ошметок человека, а не арбитр. Придаток к кибермастифу".

traits.locale_text: "We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a pathetic wretch and not an arbiter. A mere appendage to a cyber-mastiff."
"We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a pathetic wretch and not an arbiter. A mere appendage to a cyber-mastiff."
"We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a pathetic wretch, not an Arbitrator — a mere appendage to a cyber-mastiff."
"We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a pathetic wretch, not an Arbitrator — a mere appendage to a cyber-mastiff."
"We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."
"We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."

languages.text: 「かつては一心同体のように行動していたが、今はもうそうではない。最後の冷静さも失った。今の俺を見ろ！ただの人間のゴミだ。アービトレイターじゃない、サイバーマスチフの附属物に過ぎない」
languages.original_text: "We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."

traits.locale_text: 「かつては一心同体のように行動していたが、今はもうそうではない。最後の冷静さも失った。今の俺を見ろ！ただの人間のゴミだ。アービトレイターじゃない、サイバーマスチフの附属物に過ぎない」

languages.text: "Wir waren früher wie eine Einheit, aber jetzt nicht mehr. Die letzten Reste meiner Fassung sind weg. Seht mich an! Ich bin Menschenschrott, kein Arbitrator – nur ein Anhängsel eines Cyber-Mastiff."
languages.original_text: "We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."

traits.locale_text: "Wir waren früher wie eine Einheit, aber jetzt nicht mehr. Die letzten Reste meiner Fassung sind weg. Seht mich an! Ich bin Menschenschrott, kein Arbitrator – nur ein Anhängsel eines Cyber-Mastiff."

languages.text: « Autrefois, nous agissions comme un seul être. Mais cette époque est révolue. Je n'ai plus une once de sang-froid. Regardez-moi ! Je ne suis plus un arbitrator, je ne suis qu'un déchet humain, misérable appendice d'un cyber-mastiff. »
languages.original_text: "We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."

traits.locale_text: « Autrefois, nous agissions comme un seul être. Mais cette époque est révolue. Je n'ai plus une once de sang-froid. Regardez-moi ! Je ne suis plus un arbitrator, je ne suis qu'un déchet humain, misérable appendice d'un cyber-mastiff. »

languages.text: «Antes siempre actuábamos al unísono, pero ya no. He perdido los últimos resquicios de mi compostura. ¡Míreme! Soy un despojo humano, no un Arbitrator. No soy más que uno de los apéndices de un cibermastín».
languages.original_text: "We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."

traits.locale_text: «Antes siempre actuábamos al unísono, pero ya no. He perdido los últimos resquicios de mi compostura. ¡Míreme! Soy un despojo humano, no un Arbitrator. No soy más que uno de los apéndices de un cibermastín».

languages.text: “我们曾经心意相通，但现在不是了，我最后的一丝理智也崩溃了。看看我吧！我已经不是什么法务官了，不过是个人渣，是这只生化獒犬的累赘罢了。”
languages.original_text: "We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."

traits.locale_text: “我们曾经心意相通，但现在不是了，我最后的一丝理智也崩溃了。看看我吧！我已经不是什么法务官了，不过是个人渣，是这只生化獒犬的累赘罢了。”

languages.text: "Eskiden bir bütün olarak hareket ederdik, şimdiyse öyle değil... O eski soğukkanlı benden geriye hiçbir şey kalmadı. Şu hâlime bak! Yargıcı falan değil, insan müsveddesiyim. Bir siber mastifin uzantısından ibaretim."
languages.original_text: "We used to act as one, but not anymore. The last remnants of my composure are gone. Look at me! I'm a human scrap, not an Arbitrator — just an appendage to a cyber-mastiff."

traits.locale_text: "Eskiden bir bütün olarak hareket ederdik, şimdiyse öyle değil... O eski soğukkanlı benden geriye hiçbir şey kalmadı. Şu hâlime bak! Ben bir insan müsveddesiyim, Yargıcı falan değil. Bir siber mastifin uzantısından ibaretim."
